name: Modesta and Saizi Go To The Doctor
description:
I worked with a writer to create this illustrated children's book for a girl and boy in Malawi as part of Harvard College Stories for Orphans. HSCO brings students together to create custom storybooks tailored to the personalities of specific children, then prints them and ships them to the orphanages.

The book features bold illustrations with bright, contrasting color combinations. All the drawings were drawn by hand, then scanned in and colored digitally.
